name: Phys Jumper
description:
A basic physics-based 3D platformer I made whilst using unity. It involves using blocks you can spawn to maneuver across several platforms in an allotted time period. Takes about 30 minutes to complete normal & hard mode.

Controls:

BindingActionSpaceJump /Double Jump
Left ClickSpawn Physics ObjectRight ClickSpawn Static ObjectShiftSprint

Hope you enjoy it! Check out Falling Ash Games, my account aimed at providing actual complete polished games.
